item.title: Robert add a quote by Casey Stengel
item.description: "Plea to the early 1960's NY Mets. "Can't anyone here play this game?" -- Casey Stengel

item.title: Robert add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "I'd give all the wealth that years have piled, the slow result of life's decay, To be once more a little child for one bright summer day." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Robert add a quote by William Jennings Bryan
item.description: "We will answer their demand for a gold standard by saying to them: "You shall not press down upon the brow of labor this crown of thorns, you shall not crucify mankind upon a cross of gold" -- William Jennings Bryan

item.title: Robert add a quote by Notes from Nowhere
item.description: "Long standing increases all things, regardless of quality." -- Notes from Nowhere

item.title: Robert add a quote by Mike Hammer, maybe
item.description: "I tried to be one with the universe, and when that didn't work, I tried to be one with a bottle of scotch." -- Mike Hammer, maybe

item.title: Robert add a quote by Horace
item.description: "This is a fault common to singers that among their friends they were never inclined to sing when they were asked, unasked they never desist." -- Horace
